channel.title: Cs for All on C'est la Z
channel.description: Recent content in Cs for All on C'est la Z

item.title: Pushback To CS for All
item.description: On the last day of 2019, Audrey Waters wrote a great piece on The 100 Worst Ed-Tech Debacles of the Decade. I agree with most of them but felt it was worth looking at a one in particular. Specifically number 6 - "Everyone Should earn to Code." I might dive in to some others later but we'll stick with number 6 for today. I read over these right after reading Alina Adam's two posts questioning NYC's CS For All initiative.
